name: Kedgeree
description: Curried fishy goodness with plenty of flavor!
keywords: Kedgeree, Indian Cuisine, Fish Recipe, Salmon Dish, Rice Dish, Curry Powder, Hardboiled Eggs, Ghee, Coriander, Lemon, Quick Dinner, Easy Meal

recipeInstructions.name: Prep Onion
recipeInstructions.text: Heat ghee and fry the onion in a large pan. Stirring and cooking until softened, about 5m.

recipeInstructions.name: Add Curry Powder
recipeInstructions.text: Add the curry powder and cook for about 1 minute, stirring the whole time to ensure it doesn't start to burn.

recipeInstructions.name: Mix everything
recipeInstructions.text: Lower the heat. Add the salmon, rice and lemon juice mixing thoroughly. If you want a healthy addition you can add peas and/or corn at this stage. Taste and add some salt to improve flavor. Cut the heat.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve it up
recipeInstructions.text: Serve with coriander, sliced eggs and additional lemon slices for those who want more lemony goodness.

notes: Great with crispy bacon or topped with crispy chilli oil for an extra kick.
I like to add fresh chilis during the cooking process to add a bit of heat to it along with some extra flavor.
